item.title: Muscle Rub 70ml/250mg
item.dc:creator: root
item.description:
Our Muscle Rub is formulated with soothing analgesic essential oils in combination with Cannabis, CBD and Arnica to ease aches and pains and promote a cooling effect to applied areas.
Ingredients:
Organic Coconut Oil, Cannabis, Arnica, Shea Butter, CBD, essential oils of Wintergreen, Peppermint, Eucalyptus, Camphor, Black Pepper, Lavender and Nutmeg.
Available in:

item.title: Cannabis Salve 70ml stick: 250mg
item.dc:creator: root
item.description: This healing salve is a powerful topical that may be used as an anti-inflammatory to ease aches and pains while also soothing skin irritations. Enjoy deep relief without the psychoactive effect of cannabis. We carefully blend the infusion with other herbs to offer a unique salve that works on many levels. Common uses include arthritis, psoriasis, eczema, burns, rashes, anti-wrinkle, scar prevention, skin cell regeneration, sun spots, tattoo healing and to ease menstrual cramps, insomnia, migraines & headaches.

item.title: Natural Terpene Infused Lavender Soap
item.dc:creator: root
item.description:
These handcrafted all natural organic soaps are made with the highest quality ingredients. Each bar is infused with Hemp Terpenes & essential oils for medical purposes.
Discover the Amazing Benefits of this Natural Soap Infused with Hemp Oil and Hemp Terpenes
Hemp Oil is one of the worldâ€™s richest sources of polyunsaturated fats while also including two of the important essential fatty acids Omega 3 and Omega 6, and gamma-linolenic acid. These fatty acids are essential in helping maintain the natural moisture content in the body, and because of this, it acts as a good moisturizing agent for the skin. Hemp not only prevents the drying out of the skin, but it is also a rich source of Vitamin D and one begins to wonder why so little focus is provided to this wonderful option in skin care!H Hemp Oil is both moisturizing and penetrating, which helps increase its value when one is looking to add it to whole body care.
These benefits arise from the simple recognition that hemp contains three times more Omega-3 fatty acids than it does of the Omega-6. This is such an important point since Omega-3s are recognized for the anti-inflammatory benefits offered. By applying this to the skin in the form of soap, the fatty acids work to ease the inflammation caused by acne and even slow down the oxidation of free radicals, which in turn help the skin appear more healthy and youthful.
UNDERSTANDING HOW HEMP SOAPS REDUCES THE SIGNS OF AGING
One of the things many fail to realize is that as we age, the metabolism of our cells decrease and as a result, there is a reduction of essential fatty acids which are ingested that will be released into the epidermis (or the topmost layer of the skin). As a result, our skin becomes thinner and extremely dry. This age-related decline attributes to the formation of wrinkles and even the overall appearance of aged skin. The application of hemp oil through body care products, such as soaps and lotions, will compensate for the decline and minimize the signs of aging.
